sect1.title: Description
sect1.para: Generic Netlink Asymetric Communication kernel module allows for different processes to communicate through the netlink protocol.

sect2.title: Automatic setup
sect2.para: A command line utility is provided in order to interact with the kernel module.
Compile the module with specific netlink family name:
To load the last compiled module:
To unload the module with specific netlink family name:

sect2.title: Manual Setup
sect2.para: To compile the module: make To load the module into the kernel: sudo insmod driver.ko
